testcase.name: View list of all water heaters with status indicators
Filter water heaters by manufacturer
Filter water heaters by connection status
Navigate to water heater details page
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin
@current @device-operation @green Scenario: Navigate to water heater details page Given I am logged in as a "facility_manager" ... passed in 0.001s When I navigate to the water heater dashboard ... passed in 0.002s And I click on the water heater with ID "wh-001" ... passed in 0.000s Then I should be redirected to the details page for water heater "wh-001" ... passed in 0.000s And I should see the current operating status ... passed in 0.000s And I should see the reported temperature ... passed in 0.000s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Real-time updates of water heater status
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin
@current @device-operation @websocket @green Scenario: Real-time updates of water heater status Given I am logged in as a "facility_manager" ... passed in 0.001s And I am viewing the water heater dashboard ... passed in 0.002s When a water heater changes status from "ONLINE" to "OFFLINE" ... passed in 0.000s Then I should see the status indicator update without refreshing the page ... passed in 0.000s And the status change should be visually highlighted ... passed in 0.000s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
